import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EditFlightx() { const parameter = useParams() const [flight, setFlight] = useState({ id:'', aircraft_iata:'', airline_iata:'', airline_name:'', flight_status:'', flight_date:'', segments: { airport: '', city:'', country:'', iata: '', lat: '', lng: '', segment_order: undefined, segment_type: '' }, dep_airport:'' }) const [segment, setSegment] = useState({ airport:'', city:'', country:'', iata: '', lat: '', lng: '', segment_order: undefined, segment_type: '' }) // Get Airports from flight microservice useEffect (() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8082/v1/flights/"+ parameter.id) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) setFlight({ id: res.data.id, aircraft_iata: res.data.aircraft_iata, airline_iata:res.data.airline_iata, airline_name:res.data.airline_name, flight_status:res.data.flight_status, flight_date:res.data.flight_date, // segment.airport:res.data. segments: {airport:res.data.segments[0].airport} }) console.log(flight.segments) } ) },[]) const content =

Update Flight

setFlight({id:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.id)}} />
setFlight({aircraft_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.aircraft_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_iata:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_iata)}} />
setFlight({airline_name:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.airline_name)}} />
setFlight({flight_date:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_date)}} />
setFlight({flight_status:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
setFlight({dep_airport:e.target.value})} onClick={()=>{console.log(flight.flight_status)}} />
     
return (
{content}
) }
